attributes.action: Stop the government from repeatedly pushing its Withdrawal Agreement.
attributes.additional_details: If this continues happening, the argument for a second referendum has been made, since the Government is indicating it *does* approve of asking the same question multiple times.
attributes.background: The government has repeatedly insisted that holding a second referendum is wrong because the question of whether we leave has already been answered, yet hypocritically keeps trying to push the same deal again despite being voted against time and time again. This has to stop.
